lyric_text:
“送你的话”
Written by 黑羊
Beat by Toronto 7s - "Holes in the Sky"
It's been a long time...
黑羊
This goes out... to all of you who's living in the struggle
word up
真的 别那么丧
总埋怨垂头叹气 你
远比你想的棒
在属于你的领地迸发绽放闪耀光
You know I'm always proud of you
既然已定了方位
就别在意周遭太多point of view
以为的Twilight
实则是Break of dawn
再忍过寂寞难耐
相信你会成功
把每个考验作为命运安排
经历万般担待 day & blind night
必破浪乘风
Baby you’re fascinating/so amazing/breathe taking
要你知道当你让你自信上膛就会没人能够抵抗阻挡
You’ll be Miss.One&Only/Typhoon & mind-blowing
机遇要靠勤奋指导 努力织造 就迟早
Don’t fade
Everything gon be ok
So brave
Everything'll be all great
Don’t be afraid
Everything gon be ok
So break...
